ARRIVAL.title: Arrival
ARRIVAL.cast: Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker
ARRIVAL.storyline: A linguist is recruited by the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecrafts land around the world.

PREDESTINATION.title: Predestination
PREDESTINATION.cast: Ethan Hawke, Sarah Snook, Noah Taylor
PREDESTINATION.storyline: A temporal agent embarks on a final time-traveling assignment to prevent an elusive criminal from launching an attack that kills thousands of people.

INTERSTELLAR.title: Interstellar
INTERSTELLAR.cast: Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain
INTERSTELLAR.storyline: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

EX MACHINA.title: Ex Machina
EX MACHINA.cast: Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac
EX MACHINA.storyline: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

COHERENCE.title: Coherence
COHERENCE.cast: Emily Baldoni, Maury Sterling, Nicholas Brendon
COHERENCE.storyline: Eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of events due to the malevolent influence of a passing comet.

SHUTTER ISLAND.title: Shutter Island
SHUTTER ISLAND.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo
SHUTTER ISLAND.storyline: The implausible escape of a brilliant murderess brings a U.S. Marshal and his new partner to Ashecliffe Hospital, a fortress-like insane asylum located on a remote, windswept island.

INCEPTION.title: Inception
INCEPTION.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
INCEPTION.storyline: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

TRIANGLE.title: Triangle
TRIANGLE.cast: Melissa George, Joshua McIvor, Jack Taylor
TRIANGLE.storyline: A group of friends suffer a yachting accident and take refuge on a cruise drifting on the open sea, but quickly realize they were better off on the upturned yacht.

A BEAUTIFUL MIND.title: A Beautiful Mind
A BEAUTIFUL MIND.cast: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly
A BEAUTIFUL MIND.storyline: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

FIGHT CLUB.title: Fight Club
FIGHT CLUB.cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
FIGHT CLUB.storyline: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soapmaker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

THE SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION.title: The Shawshank Redemption
THE SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
THE SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION.storyline: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

FORREST GUMP.title: Forrest Gump
FORREST GUMP.cast: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise
FORREST GUMP.storyline: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
